mapper.select: select u.user_id, u.user_name, u.user_type, u.user_phone, u.user_email, b.branch_id, b.branch_name, b.branch_address from user u join branch b on b.branch_id = u.branch_id where u.user_id like concat('%',#{searchWord},'%') or u.user_name like concat('%',#{searchWord},'%') or u.user_type like concat('%',#{searchWord},'%') or u.user_phone like concat('%',#{searchWord},'%') or u.user_email like concat('%',#{searchWord},'%') or b.branch_id like concat('%',#{searchWord},'%') or b.branch_name like concat('%',#{searchWord},'%') or b.branch_address like concat('%',#{searchWord},'%')
select * from user u join branch b on b.branch_id = u.branch_id
SELECT * FROM user WHERE branch_id IS NULL;
mapper.update: update user set branch_id=null where user_id=#{user_id}
